ActPilotage Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the LAURENTIAN PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS to redefine criteria for the selection, evaluation of competencies and issuance of apprentice pilot licences to increase the size of the pool of candidates with the potential to become apprentice pilots, while ensuring that the officers it recruits are qualified.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0080 Publication Date: 2008-04-02
